sentences.en: A little wave, the first of many, splashed in my face.
sentences.cn: 一朵小小的浪花飞溅在我的脸上，紧接着更多的浪涌过来。

sentences.en: Amy lifted her arm to wave. "Goodbye," she called.
sentences.cn: 埃米举起胳膊挥挥手。“再见，”她喊道。

sentences.en: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.cn: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.en: Enid waved at us and we waved back.
sentences.cn: 伊妮德向我们挥手，我们也向她挥手。

sentences.en: He gave his imitation of Queen Elizabeth's royal wave.
sentences.cn: 他模仿伊丽莎白女王挥手致意。

sentences.en: He greeted them with a wave and a broad smile.
sentences.cn: 他向他们挥一下手，热情地笑着向他们打招呼。

sentences.en: he has already made waves as a sculptor.
sentences.cn: 作为雕塑家，他已经影响很大了。

sentences.en: He was frustrated by his inability to wave down a taxi.
sentences.cn: 连一辆出租车都打不到，他很沮丧。

sentences.en: he waved the objection aside and carried on.
sentences.cn: 他对反对意见置之不理，继续我行我素。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: Laura acknowledged this compliment with a negligent wave of her left hand.
sentences.cn: 劳拉随意挥了挥左手算是听到了这个赞扬。

sentences.en: Paddy spotted Mary Ann and gave her a cheery wave.
sentences.cn: 帕迪看到玛丽·安后高兴地冲她挥挥手。

sentences.en: People can't expect him to wave a magic wand.
sentences.cn: 人民不能指望他创造奇迹。

sentences.en: Steve stopped him with a wave of the hand.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫摆摆手让他停下来了。

sentences.en: The crisis has set off a wave of nationalist feelings in Quebec.
sentences.cn: 这一危机已在魁北克激起了一波民族独立主义情绪。

sentences.en: The driver gave me a wave and a toot.
sentences.cn: 司机冲我挥挥手，按了下喇叭。

sentences.en: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.cn: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

sentences.en: The third wave was so strong it knocked me backwards.
sentences.cn: 第3波浪太大了，把我打了回去。

sentences.en: They came to the front door to wave goodbye.
sentences.cn: 他们来到前门挥手告别。

sentences.en: You can't simply wave a wand and get rid of nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 你们不要以为魔杖一挥便能消除核武器。

words.tran_cn: 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形

phrases.tran_cn: 波浪似的，似海浪般接踵而至地
新浪潮（五十年代源于法国的电影流派）；新浪潮音乐（七十年代后期的摇滚音乐）
挥手示意（司机，车辆）停下

trans.tran_cn: 波浪，海浪，心潮，风潮，(声、光、无线电等的)波，冲击波，涌动的人/物，挥手，(头发的)波浪卷
trans.tran_en: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea

trans.tran_cn: 挥手（示意/指引），挥舞，飘动，烫（发）
trans.tran_en: if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side
to raise your arm and move your hand from side to side in order to make someone notice you
